desc: Saffron.ph is an online shop in the Phillipines for Saffron. We carry the finest premium from saffron from Iran. All quality range are available from Bunch, Pushal, Sargol and Negin.

layout.text: Most people know that saffron is rare and expensive, but many have never had the chance to experience its subtle, sophisticated charms for themselves. For those people, we hope a little history and description of this most prized of all spices will help convince you to take the plunge.
